runs.comm: good length on off stump, turned to the on side
good length, gets a bit of swing into the right hander, pushed to the on side
big inswing again, lands on a good length on off and middle, Gibbs tucks it away to fine leg
the inswing works in Gibbs' favour as he walks across the stumps and flicks with ease off his pads to midwicket
Bon cuts his pace back a little, maintains the swing, Gibbs quietly plays it down to mid-on
straying down the leg side and wide called, McCullum does well to fling himself at it
full, outside off, the ball had 'Hit Me' written all over it and Gibbs obliges with a expansive cover drive, the ball flies over the infield
good length outside off, Gillespie works up some pace, Smith gauges the bounce and lets it go
fuller in length, on the pads, Smith works it to the on side off his pads
teaser from Gillespie, lands it on a good length outside off, Gibbs tries to drive without using his feet, the ball just beats the underedge of the bat
full and outside off, Gibbs tries to drive through the covers but doesnt time it well, the ball gets the underhalf of his bat and rolls back to Gillespie
Gillespie oversteps, bowls that really wide outside the off stump as well, either way the delivery wasn't legal
the free hit costs nothing for NZ, yorker outside off, Gibbs gives room and digs it out, the ball gets the underedge and rolls to McCullum
Bond strikes! good length, angling across the left hander, Smith sticks his bat out at it and the thin outside edge is pouched by McCullum
Bond gets a little ambitious and slips that wide outside off, de Villiers stretches his bat out, misses
Bond struggles with his radar and strays down leg, good take by McCullum diving to his left
pitched up on middle and leg, swinging in, de Villiers tries to work it to the on side, inside edge onto his pads
yorker fired on off and middle, dug out to the bowler
yorker fired in outside off, de Villiers gets forward and digs it out to the on side
good length on middle and leg, pushed to the on side for a single
fuller in length, outside off, batsman gets forward and steers it to cover

big edge and taken! short of a length outside off and wide, de Villiers stays rooted to the crease and tries to slash over point, the ball gets the top half of the bat and an easy take by McCullum.  Bad ball, poor stroke
good length on off and middle, pushed to the on side
good length outside off, Kemp gets a thick inside edge onto his pads
Kemp struggles to connect the ball cleanly as he tries to work it to the off side and ends up chopping it down on the crease, the ball lobs up on the first bounce and rolls to the keeper
pushed to the off side
good length on middle and leg, delivered at a lively pace, Kemp goes back and defends to mid-on
outside off and dabbed down to third man with an open face
nice delivery, lands outside off and jags back in, Kemp keeps his eyes on the ball and defends off the full face to the off side
misfield, played down to backward point and Ross Taylor over runs it and lets the ball slip through his fingers
good length outside off and defended to point

misfield, unfortunate for Bond, Gibbs opens the face of the bat and times the ball beautifully through the off side, the fielder at cover runs across to his right, misfields on the dive and the ball races away, another desparing dive can't cut that off
slower ball, on the pads, defended to the bowler
good length on off, punched to the off side
short of a length, Kemp cuts it square, Vincent at point runs across and cuts it off
bouncer, Kemp attempts a pull, the ball whizzes past him outside off
short of a length, Kemp mistimes a pull over mid-on
slower ball, Kemp checks his stroke and pushes it on the front foot to cover
full toss, attempted slower ball, slips out and goes way outside off, Gibbs gets a thick outside edge and the ball goes past the vacant slip region
full length outside off, driven to the off side
loosener outside off, opens the face of the bat and works it to the off side
good length, on the pads, Kemp gets struck on the pads after shuffling at the crease, Oram appeals and Doctrove says no
full, in the slot and lofted over long-on, Kemp gets to the pitch of the ball and times it sweetly
full, on the pads and flicked over midwicket, Kemp gets a stride across and times it well
turned to the on side, Kemp takes his first run rather slowly, a fumble in the deep by Vettori excites Gibbs and he calls for a second, they make it comfortably
on the pads and nudged to short fine leg

short, outside off, Gibbs pulls but doesnt get the desired distance, Jeetan patel at deep square leg gets under it and manages to catch it while looking directly at the sun, the shades certainly helped
short of a length and aimed at the body, gets on the backfoot and defends
short of a length outside off, swivel pull, the ball thuds on the turf and goes to fine leg
short, Kemp goes back and executes a swivel pull, the ball travels off the meat of the bat and sails over deep midwicket
Martin adjusts hisn length to a fuller one,. aimed at the stumps, Kemp defends back to him off the full face
good length outside off, punched to cover
low full toss, outside off, turned off the wrists to midwicket, McCullum stands up to the stumps
another low full toss, on middle, Boucher pushes it down to long-on
Oram maintains the same yorker length, this one was dug out outside off to long-off
aimed at the blockhole on middle and leg, Kemp makes a bit of room and squeezes it to cover
full, on middle, Kemp drives uppishly past the vacant cover region
yorker, on leg stump, Boucher gets an inside edge onto his pads and nearly falls over with the stroke
flat delivery fired in on off, pushed to the off side on the front foot
flighted on off and middle, pushed to the off side
arm ball, outside off, punched to long-off
fired in short of a length after Vettori sees Boucher take a few paces down, the ball rolls to the on side
pushed to the off side
fired in outside off, turned to the off side
slower one, full in length, outside the off stump, pushed through cover point for a single. 90 from 59. Interesting phase of cricket on.
on a length, around the off stump, Boucher lunges forward to drive to mid-off
length delivery on the off stump line, Kemp stands tall to drive on the up to long-off
Another slower one, outside the off stump, Boucher is early with his cut shot and is beaten
fullish but well outside the off stump and with the third man up inside the circle. Boucher leaned across to chop it past that man.
a tad slower, full and outside off, Boucher is on the back foot and still, goes for a off drive and it goes in the air but falls short of extra cover fielder Vettori
floated outside off, drives to sweeper cover for a single
full and around the off stump, driven to long-off for another single
drifts in with the arm, on the middle and off, guided to cover point for a single
really slow through the air but short in length, Kemp goes on the back foot, waits on the ball and slaps it through extra cover
leans forward to defend a length delivery on the stumps to the on side
quicker, flatter, on the middle and leg, worked to midwicket for a single
low full toss, on the middle, swiped across to deep midwicket for a single. Kemp is unhappy with himself for missing out on an opportunity there.
above waist-high full toss, on the off stump, pulled to right of deep midwicket
fullish, on the off stump, driven to long-off for a single
driven to left of Nathan McCullum at long-off and they get back for two this time
another low full toss, on the middle, driven to Nathan again
yorker, outside off stump, Kemp tries to square drive, instead gets a outside edge and the ball runs to third man boundary.
full in length, on the off stump, drilled to Nathan McCullum at long-off
from round the stumps, on the middle stump line, Kemp comes down the track to work it through the on side for a single.
fuller, on the middle, driven to long-on for yet another single
arm-ball, quick, on the off stump, chopped to backward point
full and drifting down leg-side, tickled to backward square leg
flatter, on the middle and leg, pushed past midwicket for a single. 60 to win from 37 balls.
threatens to charge, Vettori keeps it cool, floats it on the middle, goes on straight, Boucher defends.
full and outside off, Kemp has a swing and a miss. He will rue that as well. It was in the slot, asking to be killed over extra cover
he murders this one instead. Low full toss, outside the off stump and Kemp brings up his fifty with a drilled-drive down the ground
They love the full tosses. Another one, on the off stump, carved away to long-on
Fab piece of timing. Really full but a touch wide outside off stump and that allows Boucher to slice it through cover point.
Another full toss, mistimes a drive to long-off. He wanted to go over extra cover but ends up mistiming.

Up up and over. Overpitched on the middle and off, Kemp does what he does best - takes out the front leg from the line and swings through the line of the ball - and the ball soars over the long-on boundary
yorker length, on the middle, jabbed back to the bowler

Gillespie takes out Boucher. From round the stumps, angling across Boucher who goes for a swipe across the line but nicks it behind. The crowd is stunned into silence. McCullum is happy, runs to his right to throw the ball high in the air. The NZ camp is thrilled
again stays round the stumps, full and slanting away, driven to cover
yorker from that angle, dug out by Pollock
almost waist-high full toss, Pollock punches it to right of Nathan McCullum at long-on
another yorker, on the middle, Pollock backs away to fist it away towards long-on. Good over that.
It's a full toss. Again. On the off stump line, low and dipping, drilled to long-off
another low full toss, again just outside off stump but unlike Pollock who went to long-off, Kemp swings it to wide long-on region.
another low full toss, dipping on the middle this time, Kemp goes down on his knee to try get under the ball and mistimes his lofted shot to long-on. It falls well short.
The full tosses keep coming and some of them will disappear. This one was sucked over long-off boundary by delighted fans. Full and just outside off, Pollock sends it high over the boundary ropes
Dropped by Ross Taylor at sweeper cover. Just short of the blockhole, around the off stump and Pollock slashes it straight to Taylor who makes a mess of it. Expensive miss.
Ah! here comes another full toss - what's going on here? -  and Kemp blasts it way over the cow corner. Monstrous hit.
threatens to charge, Vettori fires it in short , pulled over midwicket

arm-ball, homing in on the off stump, steered to backward point and they rush across for a quick single. The throw misses the sticks at the non-striker's end. it would have been interesting had it hit
comes down the track and lofts towards long-off
drifting in on the pads, runs off the pad to the on side
Murder. Down the track, he doesn't reach the pitch but goes through with his lofted shot and why not - the white balls sails high over long-on. Maximum!
comes down again, Vettori drags back the length and pushed to the on side
shout for a catch behind. Fullish, in the zone outside off stump, Kemp misses a drive, the bat hits the ground and that was the noise.
What have we got here? Yes sir, another low full toss and Kemp blasts it straight down the ground.
Slower one, short in length and well outside the off stump, Kemp goes for a cut shot and there is a noise. Did it hit the edge? Wide called.
on the middle and leg, worked past square leg
another slower one, short in length, outside off, swatted over the bowler's head
that low full toss again, but this time its at the body, short-arm jabbed away to deep square leg
walks across the sticks and of course its another full toss and Pollock paddle-scoops it high over the short fine-leg fielder.
Done in style. Typical Kemp shot. Full and on the stumps, he clears the front foot and swings through the line. The white ball disappears over long-on. Game over.
